select ch.id chapter_id,ch.title chapter_title,cr.content from app_chapter ch left join app_courses_chapter cc on ch.id=cc.chapter_id left join app_courses cr on cc.courses_id=cr.id where 1=1
and cr.id=#{course_id}

select cl.id class_id,cl.title class_title,cl.class_url,cl.time class_time from app_class cl left join app_chapter_class chl on cl.id=chl.class_id where 1=1
and chl.chapter_id=#{chapter_id}
